PHRASE.LANG: Originally designed to be stationary rifle, the D86Y Long Barrel was modify to be more compact and light weight. Made for the aggressive sniper at 12+1 rounds in the chamber, this semi auto firing rifle will keep you safe at long range, but still give you an advantage at medium ranged engagements. [#Legal]

Initialement conçu pour être stationnaire fusil, le D89Y Canon Long a été modifier pour être plus compact et léger. Fait pour le sniper agressive à 12+1 tours dans la chambre, ce semi-automatique fusil à tir te garderai à longue portée, mais encore vous donner un avantage à des engagements à distance moyenne. [#Legal]

Originally designed to be stationary rifle, the D86Y Long Barrel was modify to be more compact and light weight. Made for the aggressive sniper at 12+1 rounds in the chamber, this semi auto firing rifle will keep you safe at long range, but still give you an advantage at medium ranged engagements. [#Legal]
